StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetO.cerEventsByNwaGuid]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NwaRowGuid uniqueidentifier AS
DECLARE @ProspectID uniqueidentifier
SELECT @ProspectID = ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect WHERE NwaId = @NwaRowGuid
SELECT e.ID ,e.StartDate ,e.Comments ,s.ID as EventSourceID ,s.Name as EventSourceName ,t.ID as EventTypeID ,t.Type as EventTypeName
FROM RssOss.USMC.Event e INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSource s ON e.EventSourceId = s.ID INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventType t ON t.ID = e.EventTypeId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject sb ON sb.EventId = e.ID WHERE s.EventSourceTypeId = 1 AND sb.SubjectId IN (@NwaRowGuid, @ProspectID) ORDER BY e.StartDate DESC
